text:
A former colleague from Harvard Medical School in Boston contacted me with the following request:
> Harvard is hiring a scientist to combine optical sectioning (ie. lightsheet or confocal)  with highly multiplex imaging (> 40 markers) to look for spatial patterns in thick human tumors in 3D. If you know any PhD-level colleagues who are interested in moving into this field, could you please forward them this ad?
> <https://hitsedu.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=33|BambooHR>

elements.text: A former colleague from Harvard Medical School in Boston contacted me with the following request:

Harvard is hiring a scientist to combine optical sectioning (ie. lightsheet or confocal)  with highly multiplex imaging (> 40 markers) to look for spatial patterns in thick human tumors in 3D. If you know any PhD-level colleagues who are interested in moving into this field, could you please forward them this ad?
